xml.data:
Home » 1V Pārājikapāḷi » 1 Mahāvibhaṅga » 1.2 Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
1.2.2 Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
269.
993Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā udāyī araññe viharati. Tassāyasmato vihāro abhirūpo hoti dassanīyo pāsādiko, majjhegabbho, samantāpariyāgāro, supaññattaṃ mañcapīṭhaṃ bhisibibbohanaṃ, pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ, pariveṇaṃ susammaṭṭhaṃ. Bahū manussā āyasmato udāyissa vihārapekkhakā āgacchanti.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
994Aññataropi brāhmaṇo sapajāpatiko yenāyasmā udāyī tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ etadavoca—  “icchāma mayaṃ bhoto udāyissa vihāraṃ pekkhitun”ti. “Tena hi, brāhmaṇa, pekkhassū”ti, avāpuraṇaṃ ādāya ghaṭikaṃ ugghāṭetvā kavāṭaṃ paṇāmetvā vihāraṃ pāvisi. Sopi kho brāhmaṇo āyasmato udāyissa piṭṭhito pāvisi. Sāpi kho brāhmaṇī tassa brāhmaṇassa piṭṭhito pāvisi. Atha kho āyasmā udāyī ekacce vātapāne vivaranto ekacce vātapāne thakento gabbhaṃ anuparigantvā piṭṭhito āgantvā tassā brāhmaṇiyā aṅgamaṅgāni parāmasi. Atha kho so brāhmaṇo āyasmatā udāyinā saddhiṃ paṭisammoditvā agamāsi. Atha kho so brāhmaṇo attamano attamanavācaṃ nicchāresi—  “uḷārā ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā ye ime evarūpe araññe viharanti. Bhavampi udāyī uḷāro yo evarūpe araññe viharatī”ti.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
995Evaṃ vutte, sā brāhmaṇī taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ etadavoca—  “kuto tassa uḷārattatā. Yatheva me tvaṃ aṅgamaṅgāni parāmasi evameva me samaṇo udāyī aṅgamaṅgāni parāmasī”ti. Atha kho so brāhmaṇo ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—  “alajjino ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā dussīlā musāvādino. Ime hi nāma dhammacārino samacārino brahmacārino saccavādino sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā paṭijānissanti. Natthi imesaṃ sāmaññaṃ natthi imesaṃ brahmaññaṃ, naṭṭhaṃ imesaṃ sāmaññaṃ naṭṭhaṃ imesaṃ brahmaññaṃ, kuto imesaṃ sāmaññaṃ kuto imesaṃ brahmaññaṃ, apagatā ime sāmaññā apagatā ime brahmaññā. Kathañhi nāma samaṇo udāyī mama bhariyāya aṅgamaṅgāni parāmasissati. Na hi sakkā kulitthīhi kuladhītāhi kulakumārīhi kulasuṇhāhi kuladāsīhi ārāmaṃ vā vihāraṃ vā gantuṃ. Sace kulitthiyo kuladhītaro kulakumāriyo kulasuṇhāyo kuladāsiyo ārāmaṃ vā vihāraṃ vā gaccheyyuṃ, tāpi samaṇā sakyaputtiyā dūseyyun”ti.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
996Assosuṃ kho bhikkhu tassa brāhmaṇassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa. Ye te bhikkhū appicchā…pe…  te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—  “kathañhi nāma āyasmā udāyī mātugāmena saddhiṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjissatī”ti.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
997Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ paṭipucchi—  “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, udāyi, mātugāmena saddhiṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjasī”ti? “Saccaṃ, bhagavā”ti. Vigarahi buddho bhagavā—  “ananucchavikaṃ, moghapurisa, ananulomikaṃ appatirūpaṃ assāmaṇakaṃ akappiyaṃ akaraṇīyaṃ. Kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, mātugāmena saddhiṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjissasi. Nanu mayā, moghapurisa, anekapariyāyena virāgāya dhammo desito no sarāgāya…pe…  kāmapariḷāhānaṃ vūpasamo akkhāto. Netaṃ, moghapurisa, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya…pe…  evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha— 
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
270.
998“Yo pana bhikkhu otiṇṇo vipariṇatena cittena mātugāmena saddhiṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjeyya hatthaggāhaṃ vā veṇiggāhaṃ vā aññatarassa vā aññatarassa vā aṅgassa parāmasanaṃ, saṃghādiseso”ti. (2:6)
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
271.
999Yo panāti yo yādiso…pe…  bhikkhūti…pe…  ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto bhikkhūti.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1000Otiṇṇo nāma sāratto apekkhavā paṭibaddhacitto.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1001Vipariṇatanti rattampi cittaṃ vipariṇataṃ. Duṭṭhampi cittaṃ vipariṇataṃ. Mūḷhampi cittaṃ vipariṇataṃ. Api ca rattaṃ cittaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetaṃ vipariṇatanti.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1002Mātugāmo nāma manussitthī, na yakkhī na petī, na tiracchānagatā. Antamaso tadahujātāpi dārikā, pageva mahattarī.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1003Saddhinti ekato.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1004Kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjeyyāti ajjhācāro vuccati.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1005Hattho nāma kapparaṃ upādāya yāva agganakhā.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1006Veṇī nāma suddhakesā vā, suttamissā vā, mālāmissā vā, hiraññamissā vā, suvaṇṇamissā vā, muttāmissā vā, maṇimissā vā.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1007Aṅgaṃ nāma hatthañca veṇiñca ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ aṅgaṃ nāma.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
272.
1008Āmasanā, parāmasanā, omasanā, ummasanā, olaṅghanā, ullaṅghanā, ākaḍḍhanā, patikaḍḍhanā, abhiniggaṇhanā, abhinippīḷanā, gahaṇaṃ, chupanaṃ.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1009Āmasanā nāma āmaṭṭhamattā.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1010Parāmasanā nāma itocito ca sañcopanā.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1011Omasanā nāma heṭṭhā oropanā.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1012Ummasanā nāma uddhaṃ uccāraṇā.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1013Olaṅghanā nāma heṭṭhā onamanā.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1014Ullaṅghanā nāma uddhaṃ uccāraṇā.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1015Ākaḍḍhanā nāma āviñchanā.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1016Patikaḍḍhanā nāma patippaṇāmanā.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1017Abhiniggaṇhanā nāma aṅgaṃ gahetvā nippīḷanā.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1018Abhinippīḷanā nāma kenaci saha nippīḷanā.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1019Gahaṇaṃ nāma gahitamattaṃ.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1020Chupanaṃ nāma phuṭṭhamattaṃ.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1021Saṃghādisesoti…pe…  tenapi vuccati “saṃghādiseso”ti.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
273.
1022Itthī ca hoti itthisaññī sāratto ca bhikkhu ca. Naṃ itthiyā kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati omasati ummasati olaṅgheti ullaṅgheti ākaḍḍhati patikaḍḍhati abhiniggaṇhāti abhinippīḷeti gaṇhāti chupati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1023Itthī ca hoti vematiko sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ itthiyā kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati…pe…  gaṇhāti chupati, āpatti thullaccayassa.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1024Itthī ca hoti paṇḍakasaññī sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ itthiyā kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati…pe…  gaṇhāti chupati, āpatti thullaccayassa.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1025Itthī ca hoti purisasaññī sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ itthiyā kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati…pe…  gaṇhāti chupati, āpatti thullaccayassa.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1026Itthī ca hoti tiracchānagatasaññī sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ itthiyā kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati…pe…  gaṇhāti chupati, āpatti thullaccayassa.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1027Paṇḍako ca hoti paṇḍakasaññī sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ paṇḍakassa kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati…pe…  gaṇhāti chupati, āpatti thullaccayassa.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1028Paṇḍako ca hoti vematiko sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ paṇḍakassa kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati…pe…  gaṇhāti chupati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1029Paṇḍako ca hoti purisasaññī sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ paṇḍakassa kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati…pe…  gaṇhāti chupati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1030Paṇḍako ca hoti tiracchānagatasaññī sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ paṇḍakassa kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati…pe…  gaṇhāti chupati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1031Paṇḍako ca hoti itthisaññī sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ paṇḍakassa kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati…pe…  gaṇhāti chupati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1032Puriso ca hoti purisasaññī sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ purisassa kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati…pe…  gaṇhāti chupati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1033Puriso ca hoti vematiko…pe…  puriso ca hoti tiracchānagatasaññī…  puriso ca hoti itthisaññī…  puriso ca hoti paṇḍakasaññī sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ purisassa kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati…pe…  gaṇhāti chupati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1034Tiracchānagato ca hoti tiracchānagatasaññī sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ tiracchānagatassa kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati…pe…  gaṇhāti chupati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1035Tiracchānagato ca hoti vematiko…pe…  tiracchānagato ca hoti itthisaññī…  tiracchānagato ca hoti paṇḍakasaññī…  tiracchānagato ca hoti. Purisasaññī sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ tiracchānagatassa kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati…pe…  gaṇhāti chupati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1036Ekamūlakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
274.
1037Dve itthiyo dvinnaṃ itthīnaṃ itthisaññī sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ dvinnaṃ itthīnaṃ kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati…pe…  gaṇhāti chupati, āpatti dvinnaṃ saṃghādisesānaṃ.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1038Dve itthiyo dvinnaṃ itthīnaṃ vematiko sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ dvinnaṃ itthīnaṃ kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati…pe…  gaṇhāti chupati, āpatti dvinnaṃ thullaccayānaṃ.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1039Dve itthiyo dvinnaṃ itthīnaṃ paṇḍakasaññī…pe…  purisasaññī…  tiracchānagatasaññī sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ dvinnaṃ itthīnaṃ kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati…pe…  gaṇhāti chupati, āpatti dvinnaṃ thullaccayānaṃ.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1040Dve paṇḍakā dvinnaṃ paṇḍakānaṃ paṇḍakasaññī sāratto ca bhikkhu ca naṃ dvinnaṃ paṇḍakānaṃ kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati…pe…  gaṇhāti chupati, āpatti dvinnaṃ thullaccayānaṃ.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1041Dve paṇḍakā dvinnaṃ paṇḍakānaṃ vematiko…pe…  purisasaññī…  tiracchānagatasaññī…  itthisaññī sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ dvinnaṃ paṇḍakānaṃ kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati…pe…  gaṇhāti chupati, āpatti dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1042Dve purisā dvinnaṃ purisānaṃ purisasaññī sāratto ca bhikkhu ca naṃ dvinnaṃ purisānaṃ kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati…pe…  gaṇhāti chupati, āpatti dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1043Dve purisā dvinnaṃ purisānaṃ vematiko…pe…  tiracchānagatasaññī…  itthisaññī…  paṇḍakasaññī sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ dvinnaṃ purisānaṃ kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati…pe…  gaṇhāti chupati, āpatti dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1044Dve tiracchānagatā dvinnaṃ tiracchānagatānaṃ tiracchānagatasaññī sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ dvinnaṃ tiracchānagatānaṃ kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati…pe…  gaṇhāti chupati, āpatti dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1045Dve tiracchānagatā dvinnaṃ tiracchānagatānaṃ vematiko…pe…  itthisaññī…  paṇḍakasaññī…  purisasaññī sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ dvinnaṃ tiracchānagatānaṃ kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati…pe…  gaṇhāti chupati, āpatti dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
275.
1046Itthī ca paṇḍako ca ubhinnaṃ itthisaññī sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ ubhinnaṃ kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati…pe…  gaṇhāti chupati, āpatti saṃghādisesena dukkaṭassa.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1047Itthī ca paṇḍako ca ubhinnaṃ vematiko sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ ubhinnaṃ kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati…pe…  gaṇhāti chupati, āpatti thullaccayena dukkaṭassa.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1048Itthī ca paṇḍako ca ubhinnaṃ paṇḍakasaññī sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ ubhinnaṃ kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati…pe…  gaṇhāti chupati, āpatti dvinnaṃ thullaccayānaṃ.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1049Itthī ca paṇḍako ca ubhinnaṃ purisasaññī sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ ubhinnaṃ kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati…pe…  gaṇhāti chupati, āpatti thullaccayena dukkaṭassa.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1050Itthī ca paṇḍako ca ubhinnaṃ tiracchānagatasaññī sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ ubhinnaṃ kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati…pe…  gaṇhāti chupati, āpatti thullaccayena dukkaṭassa.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1051Itthī ca puriso ca ubhinnaṃ itthisaññī sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ ubhinnaṃ kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati…pe…  gaṇhāti chupati, āpatti saṃghādisesena dukkaṭassa.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1052Itthī ca puriso ca ubhinnaṃ vematiko…pe…  paṇḍakasaññī…  purisasaññī…  tiracchānagatasaññī sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ ubhinnaṃ kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati…pe…  gaṇhāti chupati, āpatti thullaccayena dukkaṭassa.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1053Itthī ca tiracchānagato ca ubhinnaṃ itthisaññī sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ ubhinnaṃ kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati…pe…  gaṇhāti chupati, āpatti saṃghādisesena dukkaṭassa.

1061Dumūlakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1080Bhikkhupeyyālo niṭṭhito.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
277.
1081Itthī ca hoti itthisaññī sāratto ca. Itthī ca naṃ bhikkhussa kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati omasati ummasati olaṅgheti ullaṅgheti ākaḍḍhati patikaḍḍhati abhiniggaṇhāti abhinippīḷeti gaṇhāti chupati, sevanādhippāyo kāyena vāyamati phassaṃ paṭivijānāti, āpatti saṃghādisesassa…pe… .
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1082Dve itthiyo dvinnaṃ itthīnaṃ itthisaññī sāratto ca. Itthiyo ca naṃ bhikkhussa kāyena kāyaṃ āmasanti parāmasanti omasanti ummasanti olaṅghenti ullaṅghenti ākaḍḍhanti patikaḍḍhanti abhiniggaṇhanti abhinippīḷenti gaṇhanti chupanti, sevanādhippāyo kāyena vāyamati phassaṃ paṭivijānāti, āpatti dvinnaṃ saṃghādisesānaṃ…pe… .
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1083Itthī ca paṇḍako ca ubhinnaṃ itthisaññī sāratto ca. Ubho ca naṃ bhikkhussa kāyena kāyaṃ āmasanti parāmasanti…pe…  gaṇhanti chupanti, sevanādhippāyo kāyena vāyamati phassaṃ paṭivijānāti, āpatti saṃghādisesena dukkaṭassa…pe… .

Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada

Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
279.
1102Sevanādhippāyo kāyena vāyamati phassaṃ paṭivijānāti, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1103Sevanādhippāyo kāyena vāyamati, na ca phassaṃ paṭivijānāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1104Sevanādhippāyo na ca kāyena vāyamati, phassaṃ paṭivijānāti, anāpatti.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1105Sevanādhippāyo na ca kāyena vāyamati, na ca phassaṃ paṭivijānāti, anāpatti.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1106Mokkhādhippāyo kāyena vāyamati, phassaṃ paṭivijānāti, anāpatti.

Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada

Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
1109Mokkhādhippāyo na ca kāyena vāyamati, na ca phassaṃ paṭivijānāti, anāpatti.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpada
280.
1110Anāpatti—  asañcicca, asatiyā, ajānantassa, asādiyantassa, ummattakassa, khittacittassa, vedanāṭṭassa, ādikammikassāti.
